name: Splat Runner
description:
Run all day and all through the night! Time all of your jumps perfectly to jump over as many cars as you can. Be careful not to go splat!

Splat Runner is a fun and challenging arcade-style game that will test your reflexes and reaction timing as you try to jump over an endless barrage of fast-moving obstacles.

It was made with the Unity game engine by a single developer using assets from the artists at opengameart.org and freesound.org (credits below) as well as others.

Give the game a try! Leave a comment/feedback whatever. Thanks!

CONTROLS
- Press "Spacebar" or "Left Mouse Button" to jump. Hold the button longer to jump higher.
